macros.macro: // Escape Rune Recall;// Author: Melanie Berkley <http://berkley.io>;// Version: 2.0.0;// License: BSD-2-Clause;clearjournal;while not findalias 'rune';setalias 'rune';headmsg "Target a new escape rune." 11;stop;endwhile;pause 1000;if @injournal "Object updated: 'rune'";cast "Recall";waitfortarget 15000;target! 'rune';stop;endif;cast "Recall";waitfortarget 15000;target! 'rune';pause 1000;if @injournal 'Target cannot be seen.';unsetalias 'rune';headmsg "Escape rune lost!" 334;elseif @injournal 'That is too far away.';unsetalias 'rune';headmsg "Escape rune lost!" 334;else;stop;endif;

// Make a list to name tamed creature;if not listexists "tamed";createlist "tamed";pushlist "tamed" "o";endif;// Make a list of things to tame;if not listexists "creatures";createlist "creatures";pushlist "creatures" 0xe1 //Hellhound Colors - Dull, Blood, Bright, Magenta;pushlist "creatures" 0x62 //Hellhound;pushlist "creatures" 0xe8 //Bull;pushlist "creatures" 0xe9 //Bull2;pushlist "creatures" 0x22 //White Wolf;pushlist "creatures" 0x25 //White Wolf2;pushlist "creatures" 0xda // frenzied;endif;// Start taming from list;if not @inrange "creatures" 1;@unsetalias "creatures";for 0 in "creatures";if @findtype creatures[] "any" "ground" 2 2;@setalias "creatures" "found";break;endif;endfor;endif;// If animal is more than two tiles away dont tame;if not @inrange "creatures" 1;headmsg "No new creatures near you!";replay;endif;clearjournal;while name "creatures" != tamed[0];autotargetobject "creatures";useskill "animal taming";@rename "creatures" tamed[0];pause 1000;// Follow the creature when it walks one tile away;if not @inrange "creatures" 1;if @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "Southeast";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "Southwest";elseif @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "Northeast";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "Northwest";elseif @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" == y "self";walk "East";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" == y "self";walk "West";elseif @x "creatures" == x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "South";elseif @x "creatures" == x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "North";endif;endif;endwhile;// Release the tamed animal;msg 'o release' 25;pause 1000;@ignoreobject "creatures";@unsetalias "creatures";replay;

// Make a list to name tamed creature;if not listexists "tamed";createlist "tamed";pushlist "tamed" "o";endif;// Make a list of things to tame;if not listexists "creatures";createlist "creatures";pushlist "creatures" 0xe1 //Hellhound Colors - Dull, Blood, Bright, Magenta;pushlist "creatures" 0x62 //Hellhound;pushlist "creatures" 0xe8 //Bull;pushlist "creatures" 0xe9 //Bull2;pushlist "creatures" 0x22 //White Wolf;pushlist "creatures" 0x25 //White Wolf2;pushlist "creatures" 0xda // frenzied;endif;// Start taming from list;if not @inrange "creatures" 10;@unsetalias "creatures";for 0 in "creatures";if @findtype creatures[] "any" "ground" 10 10;@setalias "creatures" "found";break;endif;endfor;endif;// If animal is more than two tiles away dont tame;if not @inrange "creatures" 10;headmsg "No new creatures near you!";replay;endif;clearjournal;while name "creatures" != tamed[0];autotargetobject "creatures";useskill "animal taming";@rename "creatures" tamed[0];pause 1000;// Follow the creature when it walks one tile away;if not @inrange "creatures" 10;if @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "Southeast";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "Southwest";elseif @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "Northeast";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "Northwest";elseif @x "creatures" > x "self" and @y "creatures" == y "self";walk "East";elseif @x "creatures" < x "self" and @y "creatures" == y "self";walk "West";elseif @x "creatures" == x "self" and @y "creatures" > y "self";walk "South";elseif @x "creatures" == x "self" and @y "creatures" < y "self";walk "North";endif;endif;endwhile;// Release the tamed animal;msg 'o release' 25;pause 1000;@ignoreobject "creatures";@unsetalias "creatures";replay;
